description:
Are you new to Photoshop Elements or upgrading from a previous version of Photoshop? Welcome to the Introduction to Photoshop Elements 13 course, an introductory course that will teach the basics of using Photoshop Elements 13.

Your professional instructor will discuss what’s new with this latest version of Photoshop Elements, how to use help facilities, and how to setup your preferences.

Learn how to import into Photoshop directly from your camera, scanner and other locations so you can easily find and touchup your photos.

Discover the Photoshop “Organizer Workspace”, a tool used for finding, organizing, and sharing your photos.

Learn basic ways to enhance your digital photographs including cropping photos and how to fix “red eye”.

This course consists of the first 3 chapters from the full 15-hour course; Master Adobe Photoshop Elements 13 offered by Simon Sez IT on Udemy.
title: Introduction to Photoshop Elements 13
